Index entries for continued fractions for constants
mathematica: tmc = Sum[ If[ OddQ[ Count[ IntegerDigits[n, 2], 1]], 2^(-n-1), 0], {n, 0, 400}]; ContinuedFraction[tmc, 91] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 23 2012 *)
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=0.0; m=70000; for (n=1, m-1, x=x+x; x=x+sum(k=0, length(binary(n))-1, bittest(n, k))%2); x=x/2^m; y=contfrac(x); for (n=1, 20001, write("b014572.txt", n-1, " ", y[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 25 2009
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
